entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 8:14PM PST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Dense Fog Possible Tonight... Fog is moving into the region from the Delta early this evening. This fog should expand overnight into portions of the North Bay valleys, including the Napa and Santa Rosa areas. Dense fog and visibility reductions to 1/4 mile or less are possible. These conditions should persist through late morning on Monday.

entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible.
